mapper.sql: gm.id as gm_id, gm.guide_id as gm_guide_id, gm.name as gm_name, gm.sample as gm_sample, gm.paper_quantity as gm_paper_quantity, gm.is_need_electronic as gm_is_need_electronic, gm.is_required as gm_is_required, gm.description as gm_description, gm.record_status as gm_record_status, gm.creator_account as gm_creator_account, gm.created_time as gm_created_time, gm.modifier_account as gm_modifier_account, gm.modified_time as gm_modified_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_approve_guide_materials gm
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
